query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS learned_theses (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  approvedDraftId INT,
  processId INT,
  thesis TEXT,
  legalFoundations TEXT,
  keywords TEXT,
  decisionPattern TEXT,
  confidence DECIMAL(3,2),
  usageCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 7gDrDqW7jwFKyJS.c06df48d9daf --database BtzVqJQrEpT2bFpeKB5YVk --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS learned_theses (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  approvedDraftId INT,
  processId INT,
  thesis TEXT,
  legalFoundations TEXT,
  keywords TEXT,
  decisionPattern TEXT,
  confidence DECIMAL(3,2),
  usageCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
